subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: For 10 years, they were a bad team with a fiendish nickname: the Tampa Bay Devil Rays. Then the club dropped the Devil from its name, and suddenly Tampa Bay is in the World Series.
snippet: For 10 years, they were a bad team with a fiendish nickname: the Tampa Bay Devil Rays. Then the club dropped the Devil from its name, and suddenly Tampa Bay is in the World Series.
